Package: com.android.build.gradle.internal.scope

[Java] Class AndroidTask<T>

    • com.android.build.gradle.internal.scope.AndroidTask

    • Handle for a org.gradle.api.Task that may not yet been created. For tasks created using ModelMap, they are usually not actually created until Gradle decides those tasks needs to be executed. This class contains information about those tasks and allow dependencies to be specified.

      • Constructor Summary

          Constructors 
          Constructor and description
          AndroidTask (String name, Class<T> taskType)

      • Method Detail

        • public void configure(TaskFactory taskFactory, org.gradle.api.Action<? super org.gradle.api.Task> configAction)

          Add a configration action for this task.

          Parameters:
          taskFactory - TaskFactory used to configure the task.
          configAction - An Action to be executed.

        • public void dependsOn(TaskFactory taskFactory, AndroidTask<?> other)

          Add dependency on another AndroidTask.

          Parameters:
          taskFactory - TaskFactory used to configure the task for dependencies.
          other - The task that this depends on.

        • public void dependsOn(TaskFactory taskFactory, Object... dependencies)

          Add dependency on objects. This method adds dependencies on any objects accepted by org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn and is needed for compatibility until all tasks are trasitioned to AndroidTask.

          Parameters:
          taskFactory - TaskFactory used to configure the task for dependencies.
          dependencies - Objects accepted by org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public List<AndroidTask<? extends org.gradle.api.Task>> getDownstreamTasks()

          Return all the AndroidTask that depends on this.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public String getName()

          The name of Task this represents.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Class<T> getTaskType()

          The type of Task this represents.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public List<AndroidTask<? extends org.gradle.api.Task>> getUpstreamTasks()

          Return all the AndroidTask this depends on.

        • public void optionalDependsOn(TaskFactory taskFactory, Object... dependencies)

          Add dependency on other objects if the object is not null. This method adds dependencies on any objects accepted by org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn and is needed for compatibility until all tasks are trasitioned to AndroidTask.

          Parameters:
          taskFactory - TaskFactory used to configure the task for dependencies.
          dependencies - Objects accepted by org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn.

        • public void optionalDependsOn(TaskFactory taskFactory, @com.android.annotations.NonNull List<?> dependencies)
